nodes.text: Asmeru was a planet in the Senex sector of the Mid Rim, on the border with the Hadar sector.
The planet was very mountainous, and had been populated by some form of civilization in the past, as evidenced by the numerous ruins that dot Asmeru's surface.
Near Asmeru was a gravitic sink known as the Asmeru Anomaly, which could be dangerous for unwary spacers.
The planet was was controlled by Houses Vandron and Elegin.
Around 32 BBY, Asmeru was the headquarters of the Nebula Front, which surrounded the planet with a dangerous minefield. The pirates were eventually defeated by an attack of Jedi and Judicials.
